alert.note: Alert for Pecos; Reeves County Plains; Terrell (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 23 at 1:59PM CST until January 24 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 6 PM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the first Wind Advisory, southeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. For the second Wind Advisory, west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Pecos and Terrell Counties, and Reeves County Plains. * WHEN...For the first Wind Advisory, until midnight CST tonight. For the second Wind Advisory, from 9 AM to 6 PM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Motorists should exercise caution while driving in the wind advisory area. Be alert to sudden gusts of wind which may cause you to lose control of your vehicle.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
